feed.title: Coder Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.12.6
entry.content:
Stable (since August 01, 2024)

Changelog

Bug fixes

  • Fix workspace actions options (#13572, 07cd9ac) (@aslilac)

    Fixes an issue causing running workspaces to display a "start" option which leads to an unhealthy agent when used.

  • Change time format string to support minute-wise configuration (#14033, eacdfb9) (@angrycub)

    Fixes an issue which prevents specifing quiet hours down to the minute.

Compare: v2.12.5...v2.12.6

Container image

  • docker pull ghcr.io/coder/coder:v2.12.6

Install/upgrade

Refer to our docs to install or upgrade Coder, or use a release asset below.

Changelog

    Fixes an issue preventing admins from specifing quiet hours down to the minute.

Compare: v2.13.2...v2.13.3

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.13.4
entry.content:
Stable (since August 06, 2024)

Changelog

Bug fixes

  • Update emoji-mart data (#13746, 4a0fd74) (@aslilac)

    Resolves an issue (#14105) causing emojis to use the wrong code in the picker.

Compare: v2.13.3...v2.13.4

Container image

  • docker pull ghcr.io/coder/coder:v2.13.4

Install/upgrade

Refer to our docs to install or upgrade Coder, or use a release asset below.

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.14.0
entry.content:
Changelog

[!NOTE] This is a mainline Coder release. We advise enterprise customers without a staging environment to install our latest stable release while we refine this version. Learn more about our Release Schedule.

[!WARNING] This release contains two known bugs that will be resolved in the next patch. - There is an issue (#14197) preventing admins from editing templates in the UI, templates can still be pushed via the CLI. - The /users DELETE endpoint currently returns a 204 on success, a change from the previous release's 200 response.

BREAKING CHANGES

  • Remove TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_3DES_EDE_CBC_SHA cipher by default (#13837, af001773d) (@coadler)

    This cipher is included by default in Go as a fallback, but is marked as an insecure cipher. This removes the 3des cipher by default.

Features

  • Add ConnectRPC variants for older Agent API versions (#13778, f6639b788) (@spikecurtis)
  • Autostop workspaces owned by suspended users (#13790, 7c41f957d) (@mtojek)
  • Added whomai to coder CLI (#13814, b07e3069d) (@BRAVO68WEB)
  • Add meticulous recorder (#13886, 8d4bccc61) (@sreya)
  • Add SMTP auth & TLS support (#13902, 943ea7c52) (@dannykopping)
  • Implement disabling oidc issuer checks (#13991, 4f0137217) (@Emyrk)
  • CLI: Show information about --wait=no for ssh (#13847, ac6db5edf) (@mafredri)
  • SDK: Export template variable parser (#13984, 7028ff79c) (@ethanndickson)
  • SDK: Export LogDest interface (#13792, c2d44d16a) (@johnstcn)
  • Dashboard: Support match option for auto create workspace flow (#13836, 6bf7e5af9) (@BrunoQuaresma)
  • Dashboard: Display tooltip in bars for app usage chart (#13854, 879c61ce2) (@BrunoQuaresma)

  • Dashboard: Add jetbrains fleet icon (#14021, ce6ee9c6c) (@michaelbrewer)

Bug fixes

  • Add policy.go as dependency of Makefile rbac target (#13757, 98c09bf5d) (@dannykopping)
  • Let workspace pages download partial logs for unhealthy workspaces (#13761, 940afa1ab) (@Parkreiner)
  • Dbpurge: disable parallel tests (#13848, 54898033b) (@mtojek)
  • Remove deprecated templates plan docs (#13824, 266913a35) (@ericpaulsen)
  • Exit reset password request before passwords are compared (#13856, d50ffa78f) (@coadler)
  • Missing nolint comment (#13862, 70046ea08) (@mtojek)
  • Change audit descriptions to indicate unsuccessful attempts (#13897, 1f24aceea) (@spikecurtis)
  • Stop blocking fake Agent API channel writes after context expires (#13908, 70c5c47ef) (@spikecurtis)
  • Fix heartbeat select to prevent leak (#13909, f21f2dce5) (@spikecurtis)
  • Hardcode default organization id in DashboardProvider (#13940, 4dcbd7179) (@aslilac)
  • TestPendingUpdatesMetric flake (#13944, c88e4162d) (@dannykopping)
  • Avoid vscodessh exit when server restarts (#13970, 38c7dcda9) (@deansheather)
  • Address TestPendingUpdatesMetric flake (695afb80e) (@dannykopping)
  • Use correct group url in multi-org experiment (#13986, a61c09e4d) (@Emyrk)
  • Use static port number for prometheus test (#14000, b3a3671c6) (@mtojek)
  • Notifications: use username in workspace URLs (#14011, d48885339) (@mtojek)
  • Resolve text overflow issues for workspace empty state (#14015, 9f3c1c736) (@Parkreiner)
  • Handle legacy licenses missing feature_set field (#14025, 96011e1b2) (@Emyrk)
  • Fix dormancy notifications (#14029, 58b810fb0) (@BrunoQuaresma)
  • Duplicate tags map in mutation to resolve race (#14047, 893169c83) (@kylecarbs)
  • Don't highlight inactive org in management settings sidebar (#14059, 56dfc64bb) (@aslilac)
  • Run update-flake with PAT to allow workflow runs (#14067, 5d42f4aa7) (@kylecarbs)
  • Block creating oidc users when oidc has not been configured (#14064, 956d0cb04) (@ethanndickson)
  • Check for io.EOF error in derpmap to resolve flake (#14125, e2cec454b) (@kylecarbs)
  • Don't require organization_id in body when updating a custom role (#14102, 166467caf) (@aslilac)
  • CLI: Do not overwrite repeated SSH options in config-ssh (#13819, 978364bd3) (@mafredri)
  • CLI: Prevent asynchronous print of version mismatch in config-ssh (#13845, 54055dc4c) (@mafredri)
  • CLI: Follow logs only when agent is starting (#13864, c8484b4fc) (@mafredri)
  • Server: Set ReadyAt for start timeout (#13846, 35a808f08) (@mafredri)
  • Provisioner: Handle multiple agents, apps, scripts and envs (#13741, 07d41716a) (@mtojek)
  • Dashboard: Enable dormant workspace to be deleted (#13850, 01b30eaa3) (@BrunoQuaresma)
  • Dashboard: Select default organization on /organizations page (#13992, 0d453437d) (@aslilac)

Changes to hidden experiments

These changes are hidden behind an unsafe experiment and will be made available in a future release. Follow progress in our issue tracker on Organizations + Custom Roles and Notifications. - Unify organization and deployment management settings (#13602, d977654f0) (@aslilac) - Implement thin vertical slice of system-generated notifications (#13537, bdd2caf95) (@dannykopping) - Add killswitch for notifications (#13794, bf392ffea) (@mtojek) - Implement observability of notifications subsystem (#13799, b2dab3308) (@dannykopping) - Notify owner about failed autobuild (#13891, a5e4bf38f) (@mtojek) - Add members settings page for organizations (#13817, a3f40d5ef) (@aslilac) - Notify on successful autoupdate (#13903, fbd1d7f9a) (@mtojek) - Add provisioner key cli commands (#13875, f975701b3) (@f0ssel) - Implement multi-org template gallery (#13784, 554c4ab1e) (@jaaydenh) - Create and modify organization groups (#13887, 0a71c34d4) (@aslilac) - Add organization details to audit log response (#13961, a8e6e89f6) (@code-asher) - Get org scoped provisioners (#13953, 0a07c7e55) (@f0ssel) - Update licensing to support multiple tiers (#13907, 15fda232b) (@Emyrk) - Add organizations filter to audit table (#13978, e8b3db8c7) (@code-asher) - Accept provisioner keys for provisioner auth (#13972, ca83017dc) (@f0ssel) - Add tags to provisioner keys api (#13989, 6161d173d) (@f0ssel) - Add --key flag to provisionerd start (#14002, 227944151) (@f0ssel) - Manage groups from deployment settings for single-org deployments (#14016, d68340b12) (@aslilac) - Notify when a user account is deleted (#14113, 6428a766a) (@mtojek) - CLI: Pause notifications (#13873, bee913ac4) (@mtojek) - Server: Notify when workspace is marked as dormant (#13868, 0d9615b4f) (@BrunoQuaresma) - Dashboard: Edit organization member roles (#13977, 38b573857) (@aslilac) - Dashboard: Allow selecting an organization when creating a template (#14061, 7125b3754) (@aslilac) - Route groups by name instead of id (#13692, f26f12339) (@jaaydenh) - Webhook endpoint YAML attribute (#13983, b817c863e) (@dannykopping) - Wrong notification group (#14112, 4242fd9c1) (@mtojek) - Dashboard: Embed users page in management settings (#14006, 615bb94ec) (@aslilac) - Notify about created user account (#14010, cf1fcab51) (@mtojek)

Documentation

  • Move architecture to top level (#13722, d8d86b16d) (@ericpaulsen)
  • Update workspace filtering docs (#13725, 9b1d8f79a) (@jaaydenh)
  • Clarify envbox version pinning (#13773, 80a2a5d6a) (@ericpaulsen)
  • Remove mention of built-in remote desktop on the roadmap (#13459, 464e7979c) (@sreya)
  • Fix VSCode web module reference (#13785, 2a297b073) (@ericpaulsen)
  • Replace coder_git_auth with coder_external_auth (#13936, 88d2dbd99) (@matifali)
  • Update Caddy config example & guide (#13964, 40b70dbdb) (@nanospearing)
  • Add preview image to release schedule (#13948, 652827f0e) (@matifali)
  • Add proxmox coder template in list of community templates (#14022, 5b35f6530) (@raulsh)

Chores

  • Update emoji-mart data (#13746, 4a0fd7466) (@aslilac)

    Resolves an issue causing emojis to use the wrong code.

  • Upgrade Go to 1.22.5 (#13820, f9ca9c7a2) (@coadler)
  • Add additional network telemetry stats & events (#13800, e8db21c89) (@ethanndickson)
  • Upgrade terraform to 1.9.2 (#13895, 7a34a70cb) (@coadler)
  • Documentation: Add missing author to support bundle guide (#13918, 3c2c5ab7f) (@stirby)
  • chore(scripts): add script to update list of experiments after release (#13872, fd10ea1dc) (@mafredri)
  • Dashboard: Remove proxy menu warnings about using fragment as child (#14121, 500a789e0) (@BrunoQuaresma)
  • Bump github.com/docker/docker (#14185, a0411a3) (@coadler)

    Resolves a critical CVE which does not affect Coder.

Other changes

  • Added Coder packages to the Snap store (coder/packages #160) (@matifali)

Compare: v2.13.3...v2.14.0

Container image

  • docker pull ghcr.io/coder/coder:v2.14.0

Install/upgrade

Refer to our docs to install or upgrade Coder, or use a release asset below.

entry.title: New release for Coder: v2.14.1
entry.content:
Changelog

[!NOTE] This is a mainline Coder release. We advise enterprise customers without a staging environment to install our latest stable release while we refine this version. Learn more about our Release Schedule.

Bug fixes

  • Add template editor to /templates/:templateName route group (#14206, d0feb70) (@aslilac)

    Resolves an issue preventing administrators from editing templates in the UI.

  • Revert status code change for delete users endpoint (#14168, b80d995) (@Emyrk)

    Resolves a breaking issue causing /users DELETE to return a 204 on success.

  • Delete user codersdk to support status code regression (#14173, b55a7a8) (@Emyrk)

Compare: v2.14.0...v2.14.1

Container image

  • docker pull ghcr.io/coder/coder:v2.14.1

Install/upgrade

Refer to our docs to install or upgrade Coder, or use a release asset below.
